text: @DondaBella @IAMGUKS @DBE_SA Obviously when you have the privileges of not going out there to hustle, then the thought would be crazy, other people literally survive from amagwinya that they sell to children going to school...if they choose not to wake up today, then it means they won’t eat on that day
